title: I'm level 5
body: Yet I'm unable to post on any forums except for this one and the new players forums. Why is this?

replies.body:
Hi Le Fizzerino!

You should be able to post in the other communities as well, as long as you are level 5.  I went ahead and tried to force your account information to sync with our Forum Database.  Let me know if your still unable to see the other communities after  24 hours!
